encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: change *high-punctus* to *middot* in fr.1 r.1; add modern apostrophe in fr. 1 r.7, fr. 1 v.5, fr. 2-4 v.12, fr. 2-4 v.13 (before the scribal one); in fr. 1 v.1 use ἐς not εἰς (as in ed.pr.); lost.1lin for fr.2-4 v.6, fr. 2-4 v.21, fr. 2-4 r.5; add *low-punctus* at end of fr. 2-4 v.12; πόνηρ’ in fr. 2-4 v.13; reverse order of elements in the |corr| tags of fr. 2-4 v.8; in fr. 2-4 v.9 add ἐπίθες to start of line and put καλῶς in square brackets at end of line; in fr. 2-4 r.8 the |reg| is <:<:σοι|reg|οι:>=P.Oxy 11.1372||ed||σου=R|σου=cett.:>; add underdot to the first iota in ἰδιώταις on frag. 2-4, recto, line 12; in fr.2-4 r.13 ed.pr. has γλώσσης (cf. r.19); in fr. 2-4 r.18 ed.pr. has εμμελείας; delete [.?] at end of fr. 2-4 r.19. META: add digital image (http://arks.princeton.edu/ark:/88435/2n49t4283); Aristophanes is CWKB 765 and Frogs is 1617; add passage details (lines 44-50, 85-91, 840-861, 879-902):

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: change *high-punctus* to *middot* in fr.1 r.1; add modern apostrophe in fr. 1 r.7, fr. 1 v.5, fr. 2-4 v.12, fr. 2-4 v.13 (before the scribal one); in fr. 1 v.1 use ἐς not εἰς (as in ed.pr.); lost.1lin for fr.2-4 v.6, fr. 2-4 v.21, fr. 2-4 r.5; add *low-punctus* at end of fr. 2-4 v.12; πόνηρ’ in fr. 2-4 v.13; reverse order of elements in the |corr| tags of fr. 2-4 v.8; in fr. 2-4 v.9 add ἐπίθες to start of line and put καλῶς in square brackets at end of line; in fr. 2-4 r.8 the |reg| is <:<:σοι|reg|οι:>=P.Oxy 11.1372||ed||σου=R|σου=cett.:>; add underdot to the first iota in ἰδιώταις on frag. 2-4, recto, line 12; in fr.2-4 r.13 ed.pr. has γλώσσης (cf. r.19); in fr. 2-4 r.18 ed.pr. has εμμελείας; delete [.?] at end of fr. 2-4 r.19. META: add digital image (http://arks.princeton.edu/ark:/88435/2n49t4283); Aristophanes is CWKB 765 and Frogs is 1617; add passage details (lines 44-50, 85-91, 840-861, 879-902):

Submit - Part of a research project with Professor Mike Sampson at the University of Manitoba. There is one error that needs to be fixed in the XML - frag. 2-4, recto, line 12, the first iota in ἰδιώταις needs an underdot.
